title: The Clients
description:
Kirk Minihane is riding high after a remarkable performance by Team Minihane. Jeff D. Lowe calls in to discuss the results and address viewer concerns. Kirk also appeared on The Dave Portnoy Show to represent his client, Rico Bosco, in contract negotiations. Former WEEI radio host John Dennis is back in the area with an appearance on the Planet Mikey show. A Red Sox employee is busted trying to entice a minor. Jeff Passan apologizes after sending out a tweet to Ben Verlander. Kirk ranks the second chairs & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
